data.text: @Imke_NO Nee, bij zelftesten eigenlijk nog steeds alleen in de neus.
@RachelKremer Word er bij jullie ook aanbevolen om eerst achterin in de keel en dan in de neus te testen?

@RachelKremer That possible. When I got tests through the mail, one warning I did get is that sitting in a very cold mailbox for an extended period of time could damage the tests, and they'd generally be more likely to skew towards false positives in that scenario.
@TomLonde I thought they were very reliable too and never had this issue the past two years so I'm also confused by it. Maybe a bad batch of tests? 🤔
@Stiif Ah, dat is wel duidelijker ja.🙈
@RachelKremer That's wild. I always thought the positives were pretty reliable, it was just the negatives that were sometimes a bit dubious...
@RachelKremer Wij hebben dezelfde tests: als hij positief is, dan zie je het Ã©cht wel. https://t.co/2DTccG8UdQ
